title: Regulating Financial Weapons of Mass Destruction
description: 10 years after dark pools of derivatives contributed to the Great Recession, former Commodity Futures Trading Commissioner Sharon Bowen tells Kate & Luigi how she helped bring transparency to the market and visited a few grain silos along the way.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
